overview:
Kal Bittianda oversees Kyriba’s North American commercial team and operations.

He brings over 20 years of experience in strategy and product development, marketing, business development and operations. He joined Kyriba from Azendant Advisors, where he advised and assisted New York-based mid-market firms on growth strategies and execution. Prior to Azendant, Kal drove the successful growth and sale of Inductis, an analytics services firm, to EXL Services in 2006. He also served as head of strategic account management for EXL Services and managed manufacturing operations at two different International Paper facilities.

Kal holds a B. Tech. in Naval Architecture from the Indian Institute of Technology in Madras, a M.S. in Industrial Engineering from Purdue University, and an M.B.A. from Harvard Business School. He is based in Kyriba’s North American Operations Center in New York.
